function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased occupancy during nighttime operation","Impact":"Higher risk of contagion due to crowded spaces","Mitigation":"Implement a reservation system and schedule staggered workout times","Technologies":"Reservation systems and occupancy monitoring apps","People":"Gym members, staff","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Lack of spatial arrangement for equipment and crowded queuing","Impact":"Risk of contagion due to close proximity and shared equipment","Mitigation":"Reorganize equipment layout and implement equipment reservation system","Technologies":"Equipment reservation software and queuing apps","People":"Gym members, staff","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Need for virtual training classes and reduced interaction","Impact":"Reduced risk of contagion through limited in-person interaction","Mitigation":"Develop and implement virtual training sessions through mobile app","Technologies":"Mobile app for virtual training and session scheduling","People":"Gym members, coaches","Owner":"Mobile app developer, facility management"}]}
